description: His grandfather Eu Tong Sen was one of Asia’s richest men, but Richard Eu says there’s a burden to carrying such a famous name. Read more at straitstimes.com.
title: Family feuds, fortunes made and lost: How Richard Eu turned TCM chain Eu Yan Sang around
title_page: Family feuds, fortunes made and lost: How Richard Eu turned TCM chain Eu Yan Sang around | The Straits Times
maintext:
If there’s one Chinese herb that Mr Richard Eu swears by, it’s cordyceps.
“Anti-ageing,” he declares.
